org.forgerock.openam.errors

Interface ExceptionMappingHandler<E extends Exception,R extends Exception>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler, IdentityResourceExceptionMappingHandler, IdentityServicesExceptionMappingHandler, ScriptExceptionMappingHandler

    public interface ExceptionMappingHandler<E extends Exception,R extends Exception>
    Translates errors from underlying processes into appropriate errors for the given task.
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R handleError(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context, org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request, E error)
      Converts an exception into an appropriate resource exception.
      R handleError(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context, String debug, org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request, E error)
      Converts an exception into an appropriate resource exception, with debug logging.
      R handleError(E error)
      Converts an exception into an appropriate resource exception.
      R handleError(org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request, E error)
      Converts an exception into an appropriate resource exception.
      R handleError(String debug, org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request, E error)
      Converts an exception into an appropriate resource exception, with debug logging.

    • Method Detail

      • handleError

        R handleError(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
              String debug,
              org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request,
              E error)
        Converts an exception into an appropriate resource exception, with debug logging.
        Parameters:
        context - the server context from which to read the preferred language.
        debug - a debug message to store.
        request - the request that failed with an error.
        error - the error that occurred.
        Returns:
        an appropriate exception.
